title: Learning and Resource Management for Strategic Planning and Organizational Performance Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Learners assume manager/leader roles, experiencing strategic planning and resource allocation decisions in a simulated environment. In VR-based scenarios, they analyze how organizational learning effectiveness and financial/human resource margins impact performance

learning_goals: Learners can identify organizational learning mechanisms during strategic planning and apply them to improve performance.
Learners can analyze the impact of human/financial resource slack on strategic execution success rates in simulation environments.
Learners can establish optimal resource allocation strategies through VR-based scenario evaluations and predict execution outcomes.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
